original_text: For the word of the cross is folly to those who are perishing, but to us who are being saved it is the power of God.
korean_text: 십자가의 도가 멸망하는 자들에게는 미련한 것이요 구원을 받는 우리에게는 하나님의 능력이라

sentences.original_text: For the word of the cross is folly
but to us who are being saved
it is the power of God
